Articles.Content:
Hmm, it seems I can't get the clouds and city lights working on a mac. I have already tried the newest RealSolarSystem.dll, but it didn't change anything.

Any suggestions what else to try?

edit: Never mind, forgot the EVE dlls ...

Edited November 12, 2014 by floppah
darth vader NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! i hope someone takes over D:
I really hope someone can take care of this, it shouldn't be too hard.

Alright, wanted to make an update.

So I've been thinking of returning in the future. I just have life issues that need to come first, and if I can get that through, and see where how the new version of E.V.E is, and re-learn it, I may possibly return in the future. I will change the state to hiatus for the time being, and will still let people who want to take over send in requests to do so, this is not a guaranteed return, but it may be one.

I thank you all for being just great people about this, and if I get the chance, I may return. Again, not guaranteed, but I am considering it. Thank you all, and good bye for now!

That is GREAT news...

Best wishes with RL... Always must come first, second, third,......google-1......

happy holidays.

darth vader NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! i hope someone takes over D:

http://www.nooooooooooooooo.com/

I've made a quick Improvement to the Manual(hopefully). It's not much, but it should shorten the thread and be of use.

Does anyone have Better Atmospheres V4 still? I've been looking online everywhere for it but cant find it anywhere. I'd really appreciate it if someone helped me

Does anyone have Better Atmospheres V4 still? I've been looking online everywhere for it but cant find it anywhere. I'd really appreciate it if someone helped me

Here you go! http://www./download/gwk27177x7j2m25/BetterAtmosphereV4%5BREL%5D.zip

As a side question, would anybody like it if I were to put up v6 beta's? They are going to be using the E.V.E overhauls, and are not going to be final in anyway, but I would just like to know if people would like to help by giving feedback as they use the beta.
Thank you so much! I also look forward to V6, I'm sure you'll impress all of us once again

Hello! I love the concept of this mod. For some reason though it wasn't working with my install. I dragged all the folders into the GameData folder but no joy. Am I doing it wrong? Do I have to turn on something in game or what?

Hello! I love the concept of this mod. For some reason though it wasn't working with my install. I dragged all the folders into the GameData folder but no joy. Am I doing it wrong? Do I have to turn on something in game or what?

Did you install all the 'dependencies'?

YAAAAY This is so awesome.

Laythe is way more Laythal now Badum tssss Had to make that joke when I saw the description

What? I don't get it...

What? I don't get it...

It was because Laythe used to be more titan-esque in the pack. This was later changed.

would anybody like it if I were to put up v6 beta's?

Would I ever!!
Sorry to bother this thread again but is there a lower resolution version for BA V4? If so I would greatly appreciate a link
Keep going on this mod, I love it. I can't run Astronomer's visual pack because of my system so I use this. Great job!
I really like this mod, and the bluish tint realsolarsystem.dll gives to kerbin, but it seems a little over the top. Is there any way I can configure it to be a little less extreme?

I really like this mod, and the bluish tint realsolarsystem.dll gives to kerbin, but it seems a little over the top. Is there any way I can configure it to be a little less extreme?

I don't remember the exact hotkey to configure it, I think it was Alt-D? If that doesn't work you may wanna ask in the RSS thread.
If you release V6 by christmas I will love you forever!

If you release V6 by christmas I will love you forever!

Yeah, I doubt that will happen. There hasn't been enough progress to be close to a V6 release. Maybe when the next E.V.E version is out.

I know I shouldn't expect it to since this is for version .25 , but is it working for anyone else on .90?

Mine keeps crashing while loading, unsure if I did something wrong or if its not .90 compatible.

I know I shouldn't expect it to since this is for version .25 , but is it working for anyone else on .90?

Mine keeps crashing while loading, unsure if I did something wrong or if its not .90 compatible.

The E.V.E/Texture Replacer portions should work, though the other's I'm not so sure of.

The E.V.E/Texture Replacer portions should work, though the other's I'm not so sure of.

Texture replacer did seem to work. Wasn't sure with the rest of the dependencies, after adding EVE and better atmospheres the crashing started, I haven't tried EVE one its own yet though.

PS: Love your avatar

Texture replacer did seem to work. Wasn't sure with the rest of the dependencies, after adding EVE and better atmospheres the crashing started, I haven't tried EVE one its own yet though.
